Sentencas: This paper addresses the design and off-design analysis of a hybrid system (HS) based on the coupling of a recuperated micro gas turbine (MGT) with a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) reactor.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: The SOFC reactor model is presented and discussed, taking into account the influence of the reactor lay-out.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: the current density, the air utilisation factor, the cell operating temperature, etc.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: The SOFC design and off-design performance is presented and discussed: the design and off-design models of a recuperated micro-gas turbine are also presented.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: The operating line, the influence of the micro gas turbine variable speed control, and the efficiency behaviour at part load are analysed in depth.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: Finally, the model of the hybrid system obtained by coupling the MGT and the SOFC reactor, considering the compatibility (technological constraints) of the two systems, is presented.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: The model allows the evaluation of the: design and off-design behaviour of the hybrid system, particularly when the MGT variable speed control system is considered.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: The thermal efficiency of the hybrid system, taking into account its size (250/300 kW(e)). is noteworthy: higher than 60% at design point, and also very high at part load conditions.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: Such a result is mainly due to the simultaneous positive influence of SOFC off-design behaviour and MGT variable speed control.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine

Sentencas: Moreover, it is possible to recover the waste heat from the gas at the MGT recuperator outlet (T-gas is about 250 degreesC) for cogeneration purposes.
Titulo: Design and part-load performance of a hybrid system based on a solid oxide fuel cell reactor and a micro gas turbine
